text:
[Lakshmana gets pacified -- Sugriva praises Rama's valour -- Lakshmana tenders apology for his harsh words]

इत्युक्तस्तारया वाक्यं प्रश्रितं धर्मसंहितम्।

मृदुस्वभावस्सौमित्रिः प्रतिजग्राह तद्वचः।।4.36.1।।
meaning: इति this, तारया by Tara, प्रश्रितम् courteous, धर्मसंहितम् justifiable, वाक्यम् words, उक्तः having been told, मृदुस्वभावः of gentle nature, सौमित्रिः Saumitri, तत् that, वचः word, प्रतिजग्राह accepted.
translation: Thus the gentlenatured Saumitri accepted Tara's courteous words sanctioned by dharma.

text:
तस्मिन्प्रतिगृहीते तु वाक्ये हरिगणेश्वरः।

लक्ष्मणात्सुमहत्त्रासं वस्त्रं क्लिन्नमिवात्यजत्।।4.36.2।।
meaning: तस्मिन् when such, वाक्ये words, प्रतिगृहीते were accepted, हरिगणेश्वरः leader of the vanara clan, लक्ष्मणात् from Lakshmana, सुमहत् great, त्रासम् fear, क्लिन्नम् wet, वस्त्रमिव like a garment, अत्यजत् cast aside.
translation: Sugriva, king of the vanara clan, cast aside his great fear when Lakshmana accepted the words of Tara just as one discards a wet garment from the body.

text:
ततः कण्ठगतं माल्यं चित्रं बहुगुणं महत्।

चिच्छेद विमदश्चासीत्सुग्रीवो वानरेश्वरः।।4.36.3।।
meaning: ततः then, वानरेश्वरः lord of vanaras, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, कण्ठगतम् worn on the neck, चित्रम् colourful, बहुगुणम् valuable, महत् great, माल्यम् garland, चिच्छेद tore off, विमदश्च relieved (from drunkenness), आसीत् got free.
translation: Thereupon Sugriva, relieved from his drunken state tore off the great, colourful valuable garland worn on his neck.

text:
स लक्ष्मणं भीमबलं सर्ववानरसत्तमः।

अब्रवीत्प्रश्रितं वाक्यं सुग्रीव स्सम्प्रहर्षयन्।।4.36.4।।
meaning: सर्ववानरसत्तमः the noble of all the vanaras, सः सुग्रीवः that Sugriva, भीमबलम् a man of great prowess, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, सम्प्रहर्षयन् pleasing manner, प्रश्रितम् वाक्यम् these polite words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
translation: Sugriva, the noblest of all monkeys, spoke these polite words in a pleasing manner to Lakshmana of terrific strength:

text:
प्रणष्टा श्रीश्च कीर्तिश्च कपिराज्यं च शाश्वतम्।

रामप्रसादात्सौमित्रे पुन: प्राप्तमिदं मया।।4.36.5।।
meaning: सौमित्रे O Saumitri, प्रणष्टा lost from me, श्री:च prosperity also, कीर्ति: च and fame, शाश्वतम् permanent, कपिराज्यं च and the kingdom of monkeys, इदम् this, रामप्रसादात् by the grace of Rama, मया by me, पुनः again, प्राप्तम् has been regained.
translation: 'O Saumitri my prosperity, fame and the permanent sovereignty of vanaras had been lost. It was regained by the grace of Rama.

text:
कश्शक्तस्तस्य देवस्य ख्यातस्य स्वेन कर्मणा।

तादृशं विक्रमं वीर प्रतिकर्तुमरिन्दम।।4.36.6।।
meaning: अरिन्दम crusher of enemies, स्वेन his own, कर्मणा by deeds, ख्यातस्य of a famed, देवस्य lord's, तस्य his, शक्तः is possible, कः who, प्रतिकर्तुम् ever to repay, तादृशम् such, विक्रमं वीर heroic valour.
translation:
'O crusher of enemies how is it possible to repay the famous lord Rama's valour (in
killing Vali)?

text:
सीतां प्राप्स्यति धर्मात्मा वधिष्यति च रावणम्।

सहायमात्रेण मया राघव स्स्वेन तेजसा।।4.36.7।।
meaning: धर्मात्मा राघवः righteous Rama, सहायमात्रेण only be an assistant, मया by me, स्वेन तेजसा by his own fiery energy, सीताम् Sita, प्राप्स्यति he will get back, रावणम् Ravana,वधिष्यति च he will kill.
translation: 'Righteous Rama can merely restore Sita with my assistance. By his own fiery energy he will kill Ravana.

text:
सहायकृत्यं किं तस्य येन सप्त महाद्रुमाः।

शैलश्च वसुधा चैव बाणेनैकेन दारिताः।।4.36.8।।
meaning: येन by whomsoever, सप्त seven, महाद्रुमाः huge trees, शैलश्च mountain too, वसुधा चैव and earth also, एकेन by only one, बाणेन with an arrow, दारिताः shattered, तस्य to him, सहायकृत्यम् assistance to be done, किम् what.
translation: 'Rama shattered seven huge trees, a mountain and earth with a single arrow. What assistance does he need?

text:
धनुर्विष्फारयानस्य यस्य शब्देन लक्ष्मण।

सशैला कम्पिता भूमिस्सहायै: किन्नु तस्य वै।।4.36.9।।
meaning: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, धनुः bow, विष्फारयानस्य with the twang of his bow, यस्य its, शब्देन by the sound, सशैला: even the mountains, भूमिः earth, कम्पिता was shaken तस्य his, सहायैः assistance, किं why?
translation: 'O Lakshmana the twang of his bow shook even the mountains and the earth. What assistance does he need?

text:
अनुयात्रां नरेन्द्रस्य करिष्येऽहं नरर्षभ।

गच्छतो रावणं हन्तुं वैरिणं सपुरस्सरम्।।4.36.10।।
meaning: नरर्षभ O bull among men, सपुरस्सरम् along with his followers, वैरिणम् the enemy, रावणम् Ravana, हन्तुम् to kill, गच्छतः while going, नरेन्द्रस्य king's, अहम् I, अनुयात्राम् following, करिष्ये I shall.
translation: 'O Lakshmana, bull among men I shall only join him along with others when he leads the army to kill Ravana.

text:
यदि किञ्चिदतिक्रान्तं विश्वासात्प्रणयेन वा।

प्रेष्यस्य क्षमितव्यं मे न कश्चिन्नापराध्यति।।4.36.11।।
meaning: विश्वासात् due to faith, प्रणयेन वा or with love, किञ्चित् even a little, अतिक्रान्तं यदि have exceeded time, प्रेष्यस्य of a servant, मे my, क्षमितव्यम् one should pardon, कश्चित् any one, नापराध्यति इति न is not flawless in the world.
translation: 'If I have committed even a little transgression in my faith in Rama or affection for him and exceeded the time limit, my mistakes are to be excused as one would pardons a servant. No one is flawless in the world.'

text:
ति तस्य ब्रुवाणस्य सुग्रीवस्य महात्मनः।

अभवल्लक्ष्मणः प्रीतः प्रेम्णा चैवमुवाच ह।।4.36.12।।
meaning: महात्मनः of the great self, तस्य his, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, इति thus, ब्रुवाणस्य of him while speaking, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, प्रीतः अभवत् was happy, प्रेम्णा with affection, च also, एवम् in this way, उवाच ह spoke.
translation: Lakshmana who was happy to hear great Sugriva replied affectionately:

text:
सर्वथा हि मम भ्राता सनाथो वानरेश्वर।

त्वया नाथेन सुग्रीव प्रश्रितेन विशेषतः।।4.36.13।।
meaning: वानरेश्वर O king of monkeys, सुग्रीव Sugriva, नाथेन by a king, विशेषतः specially, प्रश्रितेन by a courteous one, त्वया you, मम my, भ्राता brother, सर्वथा in all ways, सनाथः हि has a guardian.
translation: 'O Sugriva, king of monkeys when you are extending due courtesy to my brother,he has a guardian in you by all means.

text:
यस्ते प्रभाव स्सुग्रीव यच्च ते शौचमार्जवम्।

अर्हस्त्वं कपिराज्यस्य श्रियं भोक्तुमनुत्तमाम्।।4.36.14।।
meaning: सुग्रीव Sugriva, ते your, यः whatever, प्रभावः power, आर्जवम् straightforward nature, यत् such, शौचं च purity, त्वम् your, कपिराज्यस्य of vanara kingdom, अनुत्तमाम् excellent, श्रियम् prosperity, भोक्तुम् to enjoy, अर्हः you deserve.
translation: 'You are powerful and straightforward by nature.You are humble and noble. Therefore, you deserve the high prosperity of the kingdom of the monkeys.

text:
सहायेन तु सुग्रीव त्वया रामः प्रतापवान्।

वधिष्यति रणे शत्रूनचिरान्नात्र संशयः।।4.36.15।।
meaning: सुग्रीव Sugriva, सहायेन with you as associate, त्वया by your, प्रतापवान् valiant hero, रामः Rama, शत्रून् enemies, रणे in war, अचिरात् shortly, वधिष्यति he will kill, संशयः is doubt, न not, अत्र in this case
translation: 'O Sugriva with you as associate, valiant hero Rama will kill his enemies in war very soon. There is no doubt about it.

text:
धर्मज्ञस्य कृतज्ञस्य सङ्ग्रामेष्वनिवर्तिनः।

उपपन्नं च युक्तं च सुग्रीव तव भाषितम्।।4.36.16।।
meaning: सुग्रीव Sugriva, धर्मज्ञस्य who is aware of dhrama, कृतज्ञस्य of a grateful one, सङ्ग्रामेषु in battles, अनिवर्तिनः of one who does not retreat, तव your, भाषितम् word, उपपन्नम् true, युक्तं च is fitting also.
translation: 'O Sugriva you know dharma.You are grateful and will not turn back from the battle. So your words are true and befitting.

text:
दोषज्ञस्सति सामर्थ्ये कोऽन्यो भाषितुमर्हति।

वर्जयित्वा मम ज्येष्ठं त्वां च वानरसत्तम।।4.36.17।।
meaning: वानरसत्तम best of monkeys, मम my, ज्येष्ठम् elder brother, त्वां च and you, वर्जयित्वा with the exception of, अन्यः others, कः who, सामर्थ्ये सति capability, दोषज्ञः knows the faults of others, भाषितुम् to speak, अर्हति will be capable.
translation: 'O best of monkeys barring you and my elder brother, who else would be capable of speaking this way about themselves even when you are aware of other's faults?

text:
सदृशश्चासि रामस्य विक्रमेण बलेन च।

सहायो दैवतैर्दत्तश्चिराय हरिपुङ्गव।।4.36.18।।
meaning: हरिपुङ्गव Sugriva, दैवतैः by deities, चिराय for a long time, दत्तः given, सहायः as helper, विक्रमेण बलेन च in power and valour, रामस्य with Rama, सदृशः equal, असि you are.
translation: 'You who are equal to Rama in valour and strength, will continue to be the gift of gods to us for long.

text:
किं तु शीघ्रमितो वीर निष्क्रम त्वं मया सह।

सान्त्वयस्व वयस्यं च त्वं भार्याहरणकर्शितम्।।4.36.19।।
meaning:
किं तु nevertheless, त्वम् you, मया सह with me, इतः from this place, शीघ्रम् at once, निष्क्रम start, भार्याहरणकर्शितम् a man grieved by the abduction of his wife, वयस्य your friend,
सान्त्वयस्व reassure.
translation: 'Nevertheless I want you to proceed from here with me at once and reassure your friend who is agrieved due to the abduction of his wife.

text:
यच्च शोकाभिभूतस्य श्रुत्वा रामस्य भाषितम्।

मया त्वं परुषाण्युक्तस्तच्चत्वं क्षन्तु मर्हसि।।4.36.20।।
meaning: त्वम् You, शोकाभिभूतस्य of a griefstricken man, रामस्य भाषितम् Rama's words, श्रुत्वा after hearing, मया by me, त्वम् you, परुषाणि harshly, उक्तः इति यत् thus spoken, अर्हसि you will, तच्च that, क्षन्तुम् to forgive.
translation:
इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामयणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये किष्किन्धाकाण्डे षट्त्रिंशस्सर्गः।।
Thus ends the thirtysix sarga of Kishkindakanda of the Holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
